Mexico is not a bad place it depends what you do and who you hang with . . for me I've been to mexicali, Tijuana, guanajuato, Guadalajara, and many more places . . and there's nothing bad going on . . it disappoints me when I ask people have you been to Mexico and they reply no and I'll never go there . . it's scary or I'll get kidnapped by the cartel . . It depends who you know and what you do that causes that attention . . Mexico is a safe beautiful place. <ed> <ed> I'm proud to be 100% Latina <ed> <ed>
